intro: Goniothalamus sawtehii, commonly known as the Bornean moonseed, is a flowering plant native to the rainforests of Borneo. It belongs to the family Annonaceae, which includes many tropical trees and shrubs. The plant is characterized by its small, fragrant flowers and smooth, glossy leaves. It typically grows as an understory tree, thriving in humid, shaded environments. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
